title: e-Builder Kicks-off Stellar Agenda for 2015 User Conference
text:
e-Builder Kicks-off Stellar Agenda for 2015 User Conference Event packed with educational sessions and interactive workshops geared towards continued innovation in construction program management October 13, 2015 12:14 PM Eastern Daylight Time 
PLANTATION, Fla.--( BUSINESS WIRE )--e-Builder, the pioneer in fully integrated, cloud-based construction management software kicks off its annual user conference today in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Held at the Marriot Harbor Beach Hotel October 13-16, the conference is drawing a record number of attendees from across North America for four days of professional development and networking focused on strategies for improving construction program planning, design and processes for facility owners. 
The e-Builder User Conference provides a forum for clients and partners to learn about the latest industry trends and how to apply best practices to their current and future capital construction projects. This year’s event offers attendees a variety of educational sessions including product and business tracks and industry specific forums for healthcare, K-12, higher education and government verticals. Presenting client organizations include Columbia College, Pittsburgh Water and Sewer Authority, the University of Southern California and John Muir Health. Additional highlights include: Full- and half-day certification classes covering topics such as managing design, advanced reporting and structured workflow The announcement of e-Builder’s inaugural Construction Innovation Award winner Opportunities to work hands-on with the e-Builder development team and discuss and define upgrades to the company’s products for the year ahead The unveiling of e-Builder’s twenty 20 th anniversary charity recipients, selected from client nominations 
“Building and facility owners are realizing the significant quality improvements and cost savings possible through project management technology designed for their specific needs,” said Ron Antevy, President and Founder of e-Builder. “Our user conference provides a platform for collaborative learning, problem-solving and innovation, as well as an invaluable feedback channel for our team. It’s shaping up to be an inspirational week!” 
For more information on the e-Builder user conference, please visit http://www.e-builder.net/uc2015 . 
About e-Builder 
e-Builder is the leading provider of integrated, cloud-based construction program management software for top facility owners and the companies that act on their behalf. The company’s flagship product, e-Builder Enterprise, improves capital project execution, resulting in increased productivity and quality, reduced cost, and faster project delivery. Since 1995, e-Builder’s technology leadership and construction industry focus has provided thousands of global companies, government agencies, and healthcare and educational institutions managing billions of dollars in capital programs with solutions to improve the plan, build, and operate lifecycle. The company is privately held and headquartered in Plantation, Florida. For more information, visit www.e-Builder.net . Contacts
